sentences.sContent: The accident taught him an important lesson.
sentences.sCn: 那次事故给了他很大的教训。

sentences.sContent: Happiness is more important than money.
It’s vitally important that you understand the danger.
sentences.sCn: 了解危险所在是极为重要的。

sentences.sContent: ...In that moment of clarity Leah made an important leap...
...This is important so that the professors can enforce discipline...
...some measures mentioned below are the most important aspects that we should take into consideration...
...the most important character doctor should have is professional ethics that is the foremost way to gain trust from patients...
...it is important to find out some ways to solve the problem...
...The most important part of the application is the much feared personal statement...
...What kind of care facility old people live in may be less important than we think...
...But in the same breath will remind you that it is the most important decision of your life...
...What is the most important part of the application...
...what is important part is the lesson learned...

synos.tran: 重要的，重大的；有地位的；有权力的

phrases.pCn: 最重要的；首要的；最关键的
非常重要的；极为重要的

words.tran: 重要地；大量地；有名望地；自命不凡地
进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性

trans.tranOther: an important event, decision, problem etc has a big effect or influence on people’s lives or on events in the future
